subject: Blacks
Race
Colleges and Universities
Football
lead_paragraph: University at Buffalo teammates unanimously rejected a chance to play in the 1958 Tangerine Bowl, the university’s first — and, it turns out, only — bowl bid.
snippet: University at Buffalo teammates unanimously rejected a chance to play in the 1958 Tangerine Bowl, the university’s first — and, it turns out, only — bowl bid.
